website_summaries.verdict: Design wins the day on this apple corer, which is easy to use and easy to clean.
pros: Gives you a lot of leverage
Utensil features a release function for the core
You never have to touch the core while you are doing the job
cons: If used improperly, the metal on this corer could bend and make it unusable

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how well it works! Best kitchen gadget!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite little gadget in the kitchen. I bought this to help with the difficulty of removing the core from an apple for Apple pies. I didn't want a corer that sliced the apples because I have a food processor that does the trick. I was simply amazed at how easy and well this corer worked. I was able to core 30 apples and hand peel quick enough the apple didn't brown. Bonus, my three year old now eats apples because in his words "the inside does not look weird."
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: This was great for the first dozen uses
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first dozen uses, but then the ends got out of alignment and it no longer works well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D.

customer_reviews.title: Really great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I usually eat an apple every day, and slicing them puts less strain on my jaw (TMJ), plus it makes them easier to share if they are large and you have to coax loved ones to eat fruit. No matter the size, this gadget safely and easily slices the core right out of the middle, so no more picking out seeds or trying to cut away the hard section surrounding the seeds. Cleanup could not be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love kitchen gadgets that make my craft easier!!
customer_reviews.text: I am always in the kitchen creating something and I am all about kitchen gadgets. This one is the bomb and I love it! I don't always want to slice up the apple to core it like the other tool forces you todo especially when you are making my Signature Candy Capped Caramel Stuffed Baked Apples. (Look for my recipe). Great tool, great price, super fast delivery and a great product worth of Amazon! This product is Metal Chef Rocker approved!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, even for weaker hands.
customer_reviews.text: The handle on top makes this useable by even people who are not strong. I was hesitant to buy this in the first place because I thought it might have limited use. I have found it very useful with both apples and pears, in preparing them for dehydrating or just a quick snack. I was impressed at how easy it was to use. That handle on top really allows even people with weaker hands to use this easily. It is easy both to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: System Spyder

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, when it worked!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, loved this, when it worked. But after using it a few times, the metal became bent and no longer works properly. Prior to this, it was great. It cored my apples perfectly. You have to use some strength to push it through, but it was great until it bent. Now that it has bent, I can't remove the core easily, if at all. Disappointed that it only lasted a few weeks. **Update: The sellers were kind enough to reach out to me and send me a replacement corer. I will give it another go and update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing! Like it works so easily
customer_reviews.text: Generally I buy the cheapest thing and regret it. When I was looking for a new corer I decided to spend a little more to make the task easier. The handle feature really stood out (it reminded me of my pineapple corer) and the price was still decent so I choose this one. It's amazing! Like it works so easily. My old one I had to push the core out and risk cutting my fingers. This one has a little spring opening and while sometimes it still has to be pushed out the risk is much less. I would buy this again and have already posted on Instagram how much I love it (because adulting!)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Urban

customer_reviews.title: Does what you would expect, but does it well.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I was hoping to do. Takes the core out of apples super easily, disposes of them cleanly and washes clean esily. Having the handle separate for easy core disposal is a great touch. I have already used it on several apples and it was just that easy. Used a cutting board to not damage the counter as I pushed it through the apple, gave it a twist and pulled out a full core. Opened the handle, shook the core into the trash, quick and easy disposal. Cleanup was just as easy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayward Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours trying to cut out cores with a knife for my dehydrating apples (my favorite snack!) the search began for a corer. This saves so much time and effort. The teeth aren't as sharp as I would expect and the tool sometimes hits the core crooked. With a simple readjusting, the tool goes through the apple. The quick core release is a blessing. The box warns to keep away from acidic, alkaline, and other corrosive chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: This was so easy!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how easy it was to core my apples using this device. I careful and made sure it was going in straight, twisted back and forth, and then done. Apple cored in less than 10 seconds. Common sense advice; When I took the corer out of the box, there was a funny smell to it that was awful. Washing it the soap bubbles turned gray. Make sure to wash this in hot water and lots of soap before you use it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Actually a very simple & useful gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Have at present only used the corer twice but it worked really well. Plus it is well made so I expect it to last. I also like the extra feature of being able to open the corer to eject the core & the ergonomic design of the handle makes it easy to use. One might feel that an apple corer is an overkill but for many many years I have cut apples with a knife into segments. Then cut out the core shape with the knife, not too difficult, l but I must confess this corer does make life a little easier & quicker. A good addition to the kitchen gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: I love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been my whole life. I always had the Apple slicer corer combo , you know the round one with the little handles . I broke quite a few of those. This thing here it's so easy just insert twist and pull the core out. Stand apple on end cut in half and then start slicing the Apple as thick or thin as you want it . Easy peasy I love it and I wish I would have bought one years ago. Do I recommend absolutely five stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: tackless

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS and SO EASY
customer_reviews.text: I have a pineapple corer that I love so when I saw this, I had to try it. It works just as well. I couldn't believe how easy it is to core the apples. It took no effort at all! Of course, apples that have a flat bottom are the easy but I tried it on a one did not have a flat bottom and it still worked great. After I removed the core, I could just slice the apple. PERFECT! Grandkids love the sliced apple "donuts" and its great for baking.
customer_reviews.author: auntevie

customer_reviews.title: Going Coreless!
customer_reviews.text: With canning season among us and a healthy supply of garden fresh tomatoes, it was time I break out my secret family recipe for pasta sauce. I removed tomato cores with a pairing knife and made 8 quarts of sauce before I got this corer. MONEY WELL SPENT! Fortunately, I still have all my fingers after risking it all for the taste of quality spaghetti and lasagna. This thing zips through tomatoes like nothing and I’m 100% certain it would do the same for an apple. Mine goes straight into the dishwasher top rack as soon as I’m finished.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Easy and not
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use! The teeth on the bottom grip onto the fruit then once pressure is used it glides downward through the fruit. Once you’re completely through you pull it back through and take the center over to your trash can, hit the lever and it will loosen the grip on the core and drop into your trash with no extra help. Highly recommend this tool for those who want get rid of the core then all you have to do is cut into wedges!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: works as well as promised
customer_reviews.text: The apple corer is easy to use, but it does take a bit of strength to push it completely through an apple. You also must have good aim in order to take out the exact center. I have put it in the dishwasher, and after a half-dozen or so washings, I have seen no ill effects. If you have a really big apple, it may not take out the entire core. It sure is a lot more efficient that using a knife, and I’m thankful I ordered it each time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: RNRetired

customer_reviews.title: So many uses
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I bought it for coring apples but its great for so many things! Apples, pears, even pineapples! Someone breaks into your house? Pretty sure this would take their eyeball out in 2 seconds flat! Cuts through fruit easily and cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Best Solution for a core remover
customer_reviews.text: Life just keeps getting better. I honestly recommend owning a product like this if you are a fruit, orange, pair, etc. This apple corer will save you a lot of headaches and avoid injuring yourself with knives. A simple ABC step without any complication. Just drive the corer into the center with a little twist and out goes the core with all the seeds. Easy to clean, maintain and free of worries.
customer_reviews.author: Tou Y. Vang

customer_reviews.title: One happy pineapple eater.
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a product such as this but after reading the reviews, I decided not to get one. I looked again this week and this one was "upgraded" so I decided to go ahead and give it a try. I am surprised at the feel of quality that it has. I am more than happy with the performance and the ease of operation. Also, I received an email today with an attached operational video. How neat is that and what good customer service. With all of that being said, I highly recommend this pineapple corer to anyone that has a need.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bush

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves to eat whole apples, and by whole apples I mean the core, seeds and all. I keep trying to grab the apple away from her when she gets to the core but she always ends up eating it! The apple corer works great. You just position it over the stem and push until it goes through the bottom. Pull out the corer and open the lever (it reminds me of a curling iron) and the core pops out. Easy peasy, lemon squeezy. It has two benefits, my toddler doesn’t eat the core and she pops her thumb in the hole and carries her apple that way.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina S.

customer_reviews.title: a whole lot easier than using a knife!
customer_reviews.text: it's apple season and time to make pies. I've been using a knife which is a pain in the butt. this corer is much easier. it's a little difficult to push through very firm apples like a honey crisp but goes through a Macintosh easily. it's easy enough to pull out of apples and releases the core readily. clean up is a breeze. I don't have a dishwasher but think it could safely be put in one. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Red crow

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased to find this easy to use device
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find this apple corer on the Amazon website. I hate trying to core my apples with the old style round coring knives. This one creates a nice hole through the apple, removing all parts of the core. I love the handle which prevents any opportunity of letting the corer slip through your hand. And the convenient lever allows you to open the corer and easily remove the contents of the core quickly and efficiently. After using this apple corer, I purchased a second one for my kids who've moved out and started their own families. This corer is a real time saver!
customer_reviews.author: Bob from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: I'm eating more apples now
customer_reviews.text: Saw something similar on America's test kitchen. I have no real need for this because it's pretty simple to remove the core once an apple is halved, but I enjoy using it to a point that I'm buying more apples. Since I'm eating more fruit instead of chips, I'm giving a 5 star. Easy to remove the core and the handy side handle to release the core works great.
customer_reviews.author: T Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Through Apple Corer
customer_reviews.text: This corer replaces the other I had which was very ancient and bent. This is made of strong material and does not require much effort to core an apple and certainly is a breeze to core softer fruits such as pears. I usually core on a surface at my waist level so my body weight just presses down and things go well. It washes well and dries quickly. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: tennistoni

customer_reviews.title: Very happy to have this apple corer.
customer_reviews.text: Read some negative reviews, but I decided to try it out anyway and I’m sure glad that I did. Wonderful product. Very heavy duty. Stainless steel. Easy to use and clean. Perfect apple corer. Now I don’t have to risk cutting my own fingers while removing the seeds after having to cut the Apple in sections. I highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: It is a great corer. The spring feature allows easy core discard
customer_reviews.text: I have used other corers. I saw the positive reviews and thought that "it's just an apple corer". Well, get a bad one and you wish you had gotten one that had good reviews. I have used the solid corers, and removing the core from the corer is sometimes a hassle. This has a spring loaded handle and the removed core is easy to take out of the handle. Great price, easy to use,
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This apple corer takes a little effort to use, but it does the job. My only wish is that it was a teeny bit larger in diameter. The entire core was not removed with the first try. But with a little maneuvering, I got the whole core out. It is much better than trying to cut the core out of the apple without cutting the apple in half.
customer_reviews.author: Mockingbird50

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: at 74 years old, my concern was that I would not be able to push this apple corer through the apple, but the end has a serrated edge which with a slight twist lets the corer easily go through the apple. Just below the handle, there is a hinge that lets you easily remove the apple core from the utensil. When finished, I put this apple corer in the dishwasher and it came out of the dishwasher just fine. And my apple cobbler tasted great. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Really don't know how I managed without this apple corer. I like to make baked apples and this corer takes out a neat round core with no pits left behind. It is so easy to use and cleans up in a snap. Highly, highly recommended kitchen tool! It would be perfect for making apple dumplings too.
customer_reviews.author: Melzer

customer_reviews.title: Makes coring apples amazingly easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect way to core an apple. The handle is easy to grasp, the serrated edges cut right through the skin and meat, the corer is large enough to clear all seeds and with a simple twist and pull, the whole core comes right out. A push of the lever and the core is neatly ejected! A great addition to my kitchen! I love (!) apples baked with brown sugar, butter and cinnamon, and this corer makes these amazingly easy to make!
customer_reviews.author: S Piepmeier

customer_reviews.title: Works great for large apples
customer_reviews.text: My apple tree produces some gignormous apples sometimes and the regular peeler/corer just can't handle the big ones. With this nice little tool I can core the giants easily. And it cleans up very easy. It's very simple to use. Simple is good when you have a lot of apples to process!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon  Swain

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5
customer_reviews.text: The only real drawback is a ragged cut but considering the price I really ought not complain. This product overcomes the biggest problem I have with apple corers: difficulty in ejecting the core from the cutter. As to quality....so far, so good. It just arrived today.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Delight to use
customer_reviews.text: Using to core dozens of apples for drying and jelly. Works fast, works efficiently and is super easy to use. Goes easily through very ripe, ripe, and unripe apples equally. Core comes out with no problem thanks to hinged design. Hiqh quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an upgrade from my previous apple corer! I especially love that the center opens up to let the core out. The apple corer I owned before this one had a stick to push the core out of the center, I often spent more time just getting the core out of the corer than it would have taken me to core by hand! So glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.author: Austyn

customer_reviews.title: Good Apple Corer
customer_reviews.text: I had a corer that did a good job of coring but it was always difficult getting the ampler core out of the corer. This one splits apart with a thumb pull. Then the corer just falls out. I am concerned if I twist the corer as I work on the apple it may cause the corer to get out of alignment. So I just push it though the apple with little effort. So this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Cool Travel

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love to make apple pies but the process is very time consuming. Having the right tools makes the job a lot easier. This took made coring the apples simple and easy. I was able to understand how to use it right away and the open/close clasp feature makes it easier to clean than others.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Unitasker
customer_reviews.text: Wow. So I ran into this by way of the Cuispro listing after figuring out that one was a horrendous knockoff. And This one had Glowing reviews so I figured..why not. How have I lived without this for so long?! This corer is just Amazing!! Big apples, tiny apples, it doesn't matter. So lovely. And that core just falls right out. I've even got the hubs using it. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Binks

customer_reviews.title: The way it is contoured actually splits the apple as ...
customer_reviews.text: The way it is contoured actually splits the apple as it cores it. It's not a huge deal. It's just kind of a bummer and ruins to apple if you intend to cut rings.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Corer!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier. It's easy to use, easy to clean and cuts a perfect core every time. I would not change a thing about it. I eat lots of apples, usually at least one per day. This makes my life a lot easier. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Veteran Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The sharp edges of this corer makes a clean hole for core removal on pears and apples. I use my dehydrator to preserve quite a lot of both apples and pears. The stainless steel corer is simple to wash up. I recommend this unit to anyone. I like it enough so I bought two corers.
customer_reviews.author: RIK  L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Apple corer because I was tired of my push down model - some apples were to large and would get stuck. I am very happy I bought this one. Apple size doesn’t matter. Push down, pull out, open up and take out the core. So far it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Irms

customer_reviews.title: The design makes it easy regardless if you are left or right handed
customer_reviews.text: This ergonomic tool is something I wish I had years ago for coring apples. The design makes it easy regardless if you are left or right handed, while the stainless steel makes cleaning a breeze. I could have whipped through a bushel of apples so much quicker in the past, but now and in the future -such a breeze. The corer works for pears as well but of course not for stone fruits. Am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: The Harvester

customer_reviews.title: Best apple corer ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of apple corers over the years and I have learned that metal is better than plastic. The thing that has always annoyed me was having to push the core out of it after because sometimes I would scrape my knuckles. This solves that problem! The jaws open and the core just falls out. In the grand scheme of life was it a major problem? no, but it's the little victories that really make me happy. TL:DR amazing, must buy!
customer_reviews.author: youngsmoke

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this apple corer over the past few weeks. My son likes apple slices without the seeds and core. This devices enables me to pull pretty explicitly the part he doesn't like in one quick move. Then I use a knife to slice it up.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Primarily bought this to core apples before slicing them in my mandolin for apple chips. It is easy to use and the large handle at the top is great. I recommend going a bit slow to start for stability but once it's in, it works well. I like the gap and lever that make it easy and quick to get the core back out of the tool. Is a bit tricky to clean with all the nooks. I'll be watching the hinge mechanism for durability as well as possibility of rust, but only time will tell for both. Overall, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marie Verhey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use that my 12-yr old son does the coring while I slice. I didn’t want a peeler/corer/slicer because they are always a pain and I don’t think they work well. But this is perfect for removing the core. I also like to make baked apples where I remove the core and fill the middle and this is great for that!
customer_reviews.author: J. Slay

customer_reviews.title: Handy gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. Cores apples quite well. If you miss the center a little, or if your apple is a little asymmetrical, you can repeat as many times as necessary at an angle to get the seed area out. The apple corers with the star shape cannot do that. My kids can use this one too and pop the core right in the garbage or compost bucket. They did have to learn how to cut safely, but they are old enough now.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Throw everything else out!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is fabulous! After years of using the messy press down section cutters I saw this and figured I'd give it a try. This is the best tool for core removal I've ever used. Easy to clean easy to store sharp and very easy to use. Love it! Buy with confidence. A must have for Apple pears and all things - core!
customer_reviews.author: Romeyd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: My kids used to leave more than half the apple and leave a big core (50%) of the apple.. Seeds eeck them out and they don't want to bite into them by mistake (damn you seedless everything) .. Anyhow.. My option was to slice it and remove the seeds core.. Which makes them go brown (ewww.. according to same kids mentioned above)...now they can enjoy the instinctive timeless delicious tradition of munching down a whole apple :)
customer_reviews.author: Shadi E.

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this apple corer but I've only used it occasionally and it's already bent & doesn't cut through apples anymore after less than two years. I guess I just have to keep buying a new one every 1 1/2 years or try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Will rust easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the product!!! After I washed it it rusted so bad that I’m afraid to use it again..
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyes

customer_reviews.title: Newness Premium Apple Corer Remover
customer_reviews.text: I love this apple corer. It is super easy to use, makes quick time of completely removing the core and you're done. No more cutting the apple in half, then quarters, using a sharp knife to remove the stem and core for each piece of the apple, and then doing what you need to do. I quickly hand wash my corer, dry and pop it back in the drawer. My family eat apples every day so this is a great tool to have in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stavropoulos

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great tool
customer_reviews.text: I saw one of the chefs on the Test Kitchen using this tool for coring an apple so I thought that I'd give it a try. I am amazed how great it works. It takes the core right out and it's easy to dispose of using the little lever on the apple corer. Definitely makes coring apples an easy chore.
customer_reviews.author: Rower

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know I needed it until I used it
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to remove the core and then clean. I bought it for coring my apple prior to slicing them on the mandolin for drying but it's so easy and convient that I use it on every apple I eat or bake with.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Must-have if you eat apples! I use this every day as I eat an apple a day even before I use my apple slicer. Also, core 2/3rds down in an apple, so not to create a hole in the bottom, take out seeds, insert 1 pat of butter and sugar/cinnamon mixture, place on baking sheet sprayed with oil and bake on 375 for 35 min! Perfect tool for many uses.
customer_reviews.author: LibraLuvsAqua

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy functional kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sturdiness of the corer. It is very easy to use and speeds up the process of preparing apples for baking. My 8 year old grandson was thrilled and eager to use the corer as he helped make apple cake. I highly recommend the corer.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a relatively well-made device. The handle has a comfortable design and makes it easy to hold while pushing through apples. The product description is accurate. I believe it will provide several years of service without bending or breaking. I would have given it 5 stars for cleaning if it weren't for the hinge assembly potentially trapping bits of apple. However, it is fairly easy to clean by opening several times under running water. I have also washed it several times and it seems to be holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Garland C

customer_reviews.title: outstanding kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: My aging hands love the ergonomic design of this outstanding kitchen tool. Its handle is easy to grip and makes short work of twisting the corer's sharp teeth through the length of any apple. The spring loaded latch on its shaft makes it easy to dispose of the extracted core.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lbck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I love the option of being able to open it and discard. It's so much easier than a regular apple corer that I had previously, digging my finger in it to push out the core.
customer_reviews.author: Mr F

customer_reviews.title: Best Apple corer!
customer_reviews.text: Worked easily right on my first try. Slices through easy and smoothly. I love the handle! I got it so I can pull the core out for quicker and easier slicing for my dehydrator. Awesome! I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Derek & Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for a quality product that comes with top notch customer support after the sale
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, handy tool for those that bake a lot involving apples or pears. I purchased for my wife as we loves to slow boil pears in reduced red wine. The follow up with customer service about some delays in shipping due to some problem in a major hub for FEDEX was really appreciated, however we had already received our unit - shipping was quick and this is seemingly a high quality unit. I have already used it a handful of times and I am sure it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Removes the Core of the Apple fast!
customer_reviews.text: So my kids love apples but since they are one and two years old they end up eating the seeds. This product makes it really easy to core the apple in a few seconds. Makes it easy for me to give them apples without the worry of them eating the core. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally works great!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! Why did I take so long to order one!? Quickly, cleanly, removes core intact. Last night I used it to make some spiced apple rings. So much quicker and easier than by hand, or my apple peeler, corer, spiralizer.
customer_reviews.author: BABZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy use. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget! I wanted a corer for when I wanna give my dog a small apple as a lunch treat, and this gets the job done just fine. I usually leave the core out for the squirrels after my pup gets her apple.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Schreiber, M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen gadget you never knew you needed!
customer_reviews.text: The coolest kitchen gadget I’ve bought for kitchen in years. I will be giving one to all my friends and family for Christmas. It’s fun to use and so easy to clean and it’s the secret on how to make Apple sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's an apple corer.
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose dutifully. My girlfriend is pretty useless and can't cut an apple by herself so I have to do it for her. This lets me do it in less than 1/2 the time rather than cutting the apple through the core then paring out the seeded sections.
customer_reviews.author: NCAA FB coach

customer_reviews.title: Good Apple Peeler.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and efficient. Cores apples easily. Just what I needed when making apple pie. I just got a Johnny Apple Peeler, which is amazing—it peels, cores, and spiralizes. But this is great if you just need to core an apple.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I love slicing my apples into thin little donut shapes so they hold toppings like a healthy donut treat and this is perfect to take out the core. Perfect snack for the kids too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Works With Large Apples or Potatoes
customer_reviews.text: This corer is longer than many so ideal for very large apples or baking potatoes. The corer part is in two halves and springs open making the removal of the core and cleaning a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The best product I have purchased in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: This corer is very sturdy, nicely sharp and passes through large apples with almost no effort. Removing the core is simple with the flap and it's nice looking tool as well. So many things you buy today are such junk. This is truly a fabulous product. Made my Thanksgiving preparations much easier. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lukens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very easy to use. I previously had a different brand apple corer that was hard to clean and hard to rotate around the core, and it broke after a short time of use. I am very happy that I found this model.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Halle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is great if you want to make baked apples, or some other dish where you do not necessarily want wedges, but want the core removed. It is not flimsy at all (which can happen with less expensive kitchen gadgets) and is easy to use. I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Simple effective design
customer_reviews.text: Not much effort is needed to core the apple and the core removal is just as easy. It feels solid and well made. I anticipate it lasting for years. A very simple well thought out effective design.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product and used it on 5 big apples. It works GREAT! It is sturdier than I expected given it's split design so I expect it will last a very long time. I would Definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is great. I was wasting so much apple trying to cut the core out when I make my homemade pie filling and this took care of it. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Newness Apple Corer
customer_reviews.text: Was very simple and easy to use especially if you don't have a lot of strength. It's easier to use than an apple corer/slicer. The one that cores and slices at the same time. I bought this to make apple dumplings and just needed the core removed. But that's how I discovered it's easier to use than the apple corer/slicer. I'll probably only use the Newness Apple Corer when I need to core and slice, I'll just slice with a knife. It's that much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: marvin

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once, but it seems well made.. I love the design and how you just pop up the lever and take out the core. I only wish I had discovered it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Judy C

customer_reviews.title: Quality made - Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and well built. I have only used this once so far but it is a sturdy product. Simply place apple on cutting board and press through. Helpful hint: If you work it through with a slight twisting motion, it will work much better than just forcing it straight through in one push.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: If you spiralize fruit this is your friend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to use with my Spiralizer as it picked up too many seeds and core for my liking in apples and pears. Using this item was easy, fast, and effective. If there is any remaining core a second pass works like a charm! Clean up is a simple rinse - and the best part - my fruit Spiralized perfectly EVERY time. The cored out diameter did not affect the functionality of my Spiralizer. Thank you for a quality product and excelant service!
customer_reviews.author: Dianapace

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy making apple pies for the holidays, and I know this will speed up my workflow for years to come. Cutting the apples is the most time consuming part of the process because you have to cut around the core. With this product I know it will make the pie baking easier. The quality and the sturdiness of this cutter is good. I am not big on using kitchen tools that only have one function, but this is a rare exception.
customer_reviews.author: Christian B.

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you’re buck
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through so many different corers. This is the first one that has yet to stick or just simply not work. It works great! Does what it says! And for the money it is 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: So simple, yet so great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's so much easier and faster to use than my big, fancy, complicated tabletop peeler/corer, and it's easier to store too. I was afraid I'd need a lot more hand strength to get through the apple, but the "teeth" at the base make easy work of getting through the apple. I'm no longer put off of coring apples simply because I dread lugging my tabletop unit out of storage and setting the whole thing up. Can't recommend this little guy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Valeri

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of machinery!!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought that using this was going to be hard. I was surprised! It was great! It works very well and so easy to use. I'm glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Maria Damoulis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic, Very sturdy. Easy to use. But use common safety practices as with any sharp object.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic, Very sturdy. I bought it for apples. but it will work on anything that won't get squashed under the small amount of pressure needed to go through the fruit or vegetable, Got a kid that likes tater tots? Instant tater tot like fries. or cut them into little slices and cook that way. The creative uses of this product are endless.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Super corer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This apple corer is great. You can also use it for coring tomatoes when making salsa. Easy to use and easy to remove the core. Highly recommended. It’s apple season and I’m putting up apples and making dried apples. Really facilitates the process.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and works well with the Ambrosia apples I love. I can’t compare it to any others, since this is the first one I have ever bought. Glad I bought it though.
customer_reviews.author: champion04

customer_reviews.title: Man this is a great apple corer
customer_reviews.text: what a great little tool...gets the core right out of the apples or pears...it's really awesome. Sure makes things sooo much easier. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The best tool for coring apples!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitchen tool for coring apples! Since it is so easy to use, I usually bake a whole apple every day in my air fryer. This makes the prep fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not made very well at all and is difficult to use. I would not have bought it if I had seen quality. I wish Amazon could create a choice of made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend who can't say enough nice things about it. I just had to buy one for myself because it works so well. What a time saver!
customer_reviews.author: L. L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best apply corer I have ever had. So easy to use. It gets the core, not the side of the core, with one push into the apple; twists easily and pulls out to pop open to dispose of the core. Comfortable handle is a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: SammysCat

customer_reviews.title: Great apple corer
customer_reviews.text: Love this apple corer. Wish I had purchased one decades ago. So much easier to use than a paring knife. I cored a dozen apples to bake the other day. Without the corer, it would have taken four times as long and been at least that much more difficult and dangerous - and I probably would not have made baked apples.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas2004

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. I love it! It turns a previously potentially dangerous task for me into a fun easy time. All I have to do is aim and push down and the core pops out. I found it very easy to clean. I loved the red handle and the stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Apple Corer
customer_reviews.text: I love this lil tool. It is very easy to use and gets ALL of the core out of apples and pears. I even played around with larger tomatoes and as long as they are pretty firm, it works on them as well. Used it a lot this harvest season and very pleased with it ....
customer_reviews.author: Christine Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Now I can have intact apple slices.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Now I can slice apples thinly. Used a combo corer/slicer, but it wouldn’t allow me to make full apple rings. Happy with this and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bigwhistle

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Good kitchen gadget. Worked well to core apples / fruit. Also used with potatoes to create cylinder shapes for roasted potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bit skeptical of kitchen gadgets as commercials claim this or that; however, this DOES work well. You don’t have huge muscles to make this work for you. My scrawny 13 yr old daughter can easily core an apple with this gadget. You have to get used to knowing where actual center of Apple is. I’ve found turning Apple upside down enables you to core more correctly. Love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Classic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This apple corer is easy to use and easy to clean. It is well made and durable. I like that you can open it to remove the core instead of having to tangle it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works easily.
customer_reviews.text: Punches right through, with the handle at a convenient angle for getting good pressure on the fruit. I've used it for both apples and pears with good results.
customer_reviews.author: corig123

customer_reviews.title: Tough tool, care needed with use.
customer_reviews.text: You need to use this on larger apples, if not You could receive a good cut to your hand when the corer exits the apple.
customer_reviews.author: buzzard 1470

product_meta.title: Apple Corer, Newness Premium Apple Corer Remover, Stainless Steel Apple or Pear Core Remover Tool for Home & Kitchen with Sharp Serrated Blade
feature_bullets: Made of food grade stainless steel, easy to use, easy to clean and will last long.
Won't break or bend, ideal for home kitchen or professional bakers.
Fruit core removes easily from corer head.
Sharp blade for easy coring - speed up your cooking and baking.
Easy to use. Ergonomic handle to effortlessly twist or push corer through the apple, pear, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,612 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
